result.execSummary:
The defendant Ross M Stone was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Ross M Stone is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Ross M Stone was found guilty of 2nd Degree Sexual Assault of Child, a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.02(2).
  • Ross M Stone was found guilty of 2nd Degree Sexual Assault of Child, a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.02(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Condition pertains to both counts: Continue to receive counseling now getting as part of his Huber.  No contact with the victims unless approved by counselors, agents and the victims. No contact minors under any circumstances unless chaperoned and approved by the agent. Full time employment or be in student status. Complete all programming deemed appropriate by the department. Submit DNA sample, pay $518 costs on each count, payable out of posted bond. No viewing of sexually explicit pictures, No Internet usage unless approved by agent and only for school or employment purposes. Register as sexual offender.

timeConds.notes: Huber only for counseling now receiving.

defendant.name: Stone, Ross M
defendant.address: 331 Country Clover Drive, c/o Arlene Kuipers, De Forest, WI 53532

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: filed by Court Reporter Chris Champeau, February 24, 2015 excerpt of sentencing hearing
Three received.
Two victim impact statements received from Victim/Witness Asst. T. Lutey
filed by Attorney Gonzalez

Defendant Ross M Stone in court with attorney Jason C. Gonzalez. Troy D Cross appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Parties received PSI - no issues with it.  Sentence statements by attorneys. Court withheld sentence, placed defendant on probation for 11 years on each count, concurrent with each other. Conditions: Continue to receive counseling now getting as part of his Huber. 1 year jail, no good time, starting Feb. 25, 2015 at 7 p.m.(jail is on count 3) Huber only for counseling now receiving. No contact with the victims unless approved by counselors, agents and the victims. No contact minors under any circumstances unless chaperoned and approved by the agent. Full time employment or be in student status. Complete all programming deemed appropriate by the department. Submit DNA sample, pay $518 costs on each count, payable out of posted bond. No viewing of sexually explicit pictures, No Internet usage unless approved by agent and only for school or employment purposes. Register as sexual offender. Court granted 2 days jail credit.
filed by Agent Crystal Morrison of Portage office
Appointed Attorney Jason Gonzalez
filed by defendant/counsel

Defendant Ross M Stone in court with attorney Randall M. Holtz.  Troy D Cross appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Rights/Elements, Dendant pleads no contest to Ct. 3 and Ct. 4, Judgment to be entered, Ct. 1 and Ct. 2 dismissed, Court orders PSI be completed w/in 60 days, bond cont'd
Defendant Ross M Stone in court with attorney Randall M. Holtz.  Jordan Lippert appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Holtz contacted Br. 3 for plea/sentencing time, bond cont'd

Defendant Ross M Stone in court with attorney Randall M. Holtz.  Crystal N Long appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Waiver of Preliminary Hearing filed. Court found probable cause, bound defendant over.  Information filed, reading waived.  Arraignment date set. 10/2/14 at 2:45 pm.
